title: How to Attract a Capricorn Woman As a Taurus Man

steps.title: Show up when she expects you to and you’ll score a second date.
steps.content: Show up when she expects you to and you’ll score a second date. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. A Capricorn woman works really hard and has a very packed schedule, so she’s already going out of her way if she agrees to meet for lunch or coffee. Since she doesn't want to waste time, she’ll test you and see how reliable you are. If she looks up and you show up right when you promised to, you’ll put a huge smile on her face. If you manage to throw in an extra special gesture, like bringing flowers, and are still really punctual, she’ll be blown away. A Capricorn woman is ruled by Saturn, so she can make super quick judgments. If she notices your attention to details like logistics right away, you’ll already be at the top of her list.

steps.title: You’re both choosy, so she’ll feel flattered when you include her.
steps.content: You’re both choosy, so she’ll feel flattered when you include her. When two earth signs like a Capricorn woman and a Taurus man get together, it’s pretty obvious that they’re both selective. [2] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Once you bond over taking time with people, tell her that you think she’d be a perfect fit for your group of friends. Ask her to come with you to a low-key event, like a trivia night. Her heart will flutter when you let her step into your world. Explain why you’re inviting her so she knows you’re sincere. You can say something like, “You’re the wittiest person I know. With you as my secret weapon, I’ll dominate every trivia category!” Point out that you rarely let dates tag along with you—she’ll appreciate that you enjoy her company and fantasize about being on your arm more often.

steps.title: This earth sign craves honesty, so just confess you’re attracted to her.
steps.content: This earth sign craves honesty, so just confess you’re attracted to her. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. The biggest common ground between a Capricorn and a Taurus is a desire to know the truth. You’re better off if you tell her your feelings right away—reveal everything you love about her and you'll dazzle her. You’ll set yourself apart from anyone else trying to play it too cool, and she’ll see actual relationship potential with you. [4] X Research source When you cut to the chase and say you see more than a friendship or casual situation with her, she’ll think about your courage all day. Cover all the bases—admit to an emotional, physical, and mental attraction. She’ll know you don’t hold anything back.

steps.title: Appeal to all five of her senses and she’ll realize you’re her dream man.
steps.content: Appeal to all five of her senses and she’ll realize you’re her dream man. Bring her to an upscale restaurant that smells aromatic, has gorgeous decor, and serves delicious dishes. Hold her hand to send shivers down her spine, and tell her that she deserves the royal treatment because she’s so exquisite. She’ll hardly believe that you’re real, and by the time the evening is over, your favorite Capricorn will want to be all yours. A Capricorn and a Taurus are both sensual earth signs that love worldly pleasures like fine dining, so this date will prove what a great match you make. While this is definitely a bit of an investment, she’ll respect that you’ll splurge a little for her. Plus, you’ll enjoy yourself, too!

steps.title: When she gets your full attention, you’ll leave her completely satisfied.
steps.content: When she gets your full attention, you’ll leave her completely satisfied. Make sure that she does most of the talking—as a tender and caring Taurus, you’ll make a point that you’re different from many of the other signs that may pursue her. Carefully consider whatever she tells you. Then, answer with detailed observations or follow-up comments. Because you’re so interested, she’ll feel like you’re worshiping her and find it incredibly seductive. A Capricorn woman is highly analytical, so she’s been waiting for someone to let her unpack everything she notices. Remind her that you’ll keep everything she tells you confidential. She’ll adore how trustworthy you are, and she’ll know she can be vulnerable around you.

steps.title: Play off your differences and hook her with how engaging you are.
steps.content: Play off your differences and hook her with how engaging you are. A Capricorn is ruled by Saturn and focuses only on what’s practical or realistic. Since you’re influenced by Venus, you are more driven by emotions. The beauty in this contrast is that you’ll both have so much to talk about. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. She’ll be stirred up and challenged, but she’ll also know you’re the best person to turn to for a stimulating discussion. [6] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. A Capricorn needs a strong mental connection, so don’t be afraid of debates. As long as you keep everything respectful, she’ll feel really engaged. Because she’s so drawn to your empathy, she’ll also seek you out when she needs to process her emotions.

steps.title: She finds ambition addictive, so share the goals you’re chasing after.
steps.content: She finds ambition addictive, so share the goals you’re chasing after. You’re two of the least impulsive signs, and you both like to map out your futures. Ask her wants to accomplish in 5-10 years. Naturally, she’ll ask you the same thing. If you jump right into your answers, she’ll be impressed. Outline all the steps you’ll take to manifest what you want to accomplish, too—she’ll picture you as the other half of an incredible power couple. [7] X Research source Suggest how you can help her out and she’ll be putty in your hands. For example, if she wants to set up an e-course, you can offer to edit her videos. Encourage her with sincere praise to lift her spirits. You can say something like, “You know marketing inside and out! You definitely have so much to teach about that subject.”

steps.title: She’ll feel fired up and get lost in the fun little game.
steps.content: She’ll feel fired up and get lost in the fun little game. After you’ve swapped standards you want to hold yourselves to, tease her and tell her you want to see who can meet their goal first. If there’s any overlap, like the fact that you both want to run a marathon, then motivate her so she pushes herself a little harder—in this case, you can sprint and see if she’ll keep up with you. With all your creative encouragement, she’ll feel like her best self around you and want you by her side. [8] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Be sure to balance out all that flirty competition with compliments and praise—she’ll definitely want to hear you gush over her accomplishments!

steps.title: She’s a sucker for a good budget and will see you as a great provider.
steps.content: She’s a sucker for a good budget and will see you as a great provider. A Capricorn always has her eye on her finances, and she respects a partner who isn’t cash-strapped. Explain that you like to make smart investments and how you plan to increase your income—when she hears that you’re just as careful as she is, she’ll imagine a more serious dynamic with you. [9] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. The cautious Capricorn loves to save all the money she can, while Venus’ influence over you allows you to grow your wealth pretty easily. She’ll love that the two of you can balance each other out and plan a future together.

steps.title: A Capricorn rarely treats herself, so this will take her breath away.
steps.content: A Capricorn rarely treats herself, so this will take her breath away. She’s never tempted to make an impulse buy, and she sticks to the basics so she has a lot left over in the bank. Use your Venusian sensibilities to pick out something special that is perfect for her, even if it never crossed her mind. For example, give her a pendant necklace that matches her eyes or a chic bracelet watch. She’ll treasure whatever you find, and she’ll worship you for all the effort you went through. Home decor, such as a beautiful vase, is another great choice for a Capricorn—she wants to create the most calming space that she can and loves to add extra touches. You’ll also show off your domestic side as a Taurus, which she’ll swoon over.

steps.title: Touch is the ultimate way to express love and passion to a Capricorn.
steps.content: Touch is the ultimate way to express love and passion to a Capricorn. She would rather be held and caressed than told how much you adore her. After the beginning stages of dating, she’ll already know you’re attracted to her, so she’ll want to truly feel your affection for her instead. Whenever you’re with her, spend a lot of quality time exploring new forms of physical intimacy. She’ll long for your tenderness and intensity. Since you come across as really strong and powerful as a Taurus, she’ll be honored to see your more vulnerable and caring side. Saturn rules over a Capricorn, so she is used to taking her time with intimacy. However, once she falls for your Venusian charms and your loving energy, she’ll want to hold onto you for good.

steps.title: A Capricorn commits when she’s convinced about your loyalty.
steps.content: A Capricorn commits when she’s convinced about your loyalty. She’s extremely practical and only wants to move forward with a partner who will be an ongoing part of her life. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Explain to her that she has a place in your heart and that you’ll keep investing in your relationship. She’ll see you as a possible soulmate and stay around to see what else is in store for the both of you. [11] X Research source You’re both stable earth signs that hope for a life partner, so your long-term compatibility is extremely promising. Enjoy the journey! [12] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.
